version_description:
- Registration and Log In to the server can be done using Game Center
- Dice deck now appears on the left side
- Fixed important error in troop calculation
- Several bug fixes
- Disordered info, stats and player picker fixed

- RANKED Matches!!
- New level system with a global leaderboard
- New animations for Sabotage, Morale, Militia Support, and Espionage
- Bug fixes

- Fixed freezing when typing emoji icons
- From 3.0: Ranked Matches! Medals and a global leaderboard!
- Location based match making

- Server region can now be selected in the settings screen
- More games button is now functional!

- Bug fixes
- Under the hood changes to allow you to reuse your account to play in our other games
- Fix for Play Online crash

- New Artillery Card!
- Rules now rotate in ranked matches
- Improved UI
- Bug fixes

- New Online Ranked Leagues!
- New Mission System to progress playing both online and offline!
- New Pacific Theater map!
- New avatars!
- AI improved!

- New Events!
- Lots of bug fixes
- Fix for Play Online crash

- New redesign!
- Seasons and leagues with rewards
- Skins
- Avatars
- Unique colors

- Faster animations
- "Match of the Day"
- Alliance now lasts 1 full turn
- Bug fixes

- Italiano!
- Chat legibility improvements and bug fixes
- Map legibility improvements
- Fixed alliance taking more than 1 full turn in strategic
- Fixed possible desync issue
- Fix for freezing online games

New Map! World domination
New Colors! U.S.A and Italy
New Avatars! Scimitar and Royal crown
New Settings! Fog of war and initial territory selection
New gift mechanic
Maps look bigger now
Changed input method
Basic colors are more clear and distinct from one another
Anti-cheat system

- New Online Ranked Leagues!
- New Mission System to progress playing both online and offline!
- New Pacific Theater map!
- New avatars!
- AI improved!

- End of season rewards for the top 10 players in each league group!
- New UK themed skin, avatar and color!
- Better explanation of the online league system
- Chat improvements
- Fixed AI freeze when it lost its command center

- New Battle Deck Mode
- New Cards: Kamikaze, Flak Tower, Energy Powerplant (only for Battle Deck)
- Battle Deck event on weekends with XP rewards
- Sabotage now also subtracts troops from continent bonuses

- New Events!
- Lots of bug fixes

- New Artillery Card!
- Rules now rotate in ranked matches
- Improved UI
- Bug fixes

- Option to play with secret objectives!
- Fixed Facebook login
- Forced Alliance card now allows the player using it to keep attacking
- Fixed several AI issues
- Fixed powerplant not calculating energy correctly

- New Blood & Honor game mode!
* All players plan their actions at the same time
* No dice so its more strategic
- Classic world continent bonus tweaks
- Bug fixes

- New Blood & Honor game mode!
* All players plan their actions at the same time
* No dice so its more strategic
- Classic world continent bonus tweaks
- Bug fixes

- New Path to Glory metagame!
- Cards can now be upgraded!

- New Minefield card!
- Bug fixes

- New 10 round limit
- Many bug fixes

- 10 round limit is an option
- Bug fixes
- USSR faction!

- New single-player challenge!
- New Paratrooper card!
- New Languages, Russian and Arabic!
- Fixes to Flak card

- New Italian Faction!
- 4 New Avatars
- Soviet Color
- In game chat with emotes and predefined phrases

- 2v2 Battles! Play ranked games with a teammate
- Clans! Team up with friends to dominate the ladder

- Play any map online by watching a video
- Tweaks to the main screen to simplify and add team battles
- View other players' info in the game
- Chat is enabled for team and friendly matches
- Fix to game freeze at the end of the match

What's new:
- Optimized app size
- Fixed several issues

- We've added a new card: Blitzkrieg!
- We've added a new Arab faction!
- 5 new avatars
- Desert camouflage color
- We've fixed some bugs in 2v2 battles and increased duration of turns in those battles

- Missions now give you Battle Chest tokens
- You can get free tokens after each online match
- Added rewards to Road to Glory

- 38 New Missions!
- Improved animations and UI

- New Medic Card!
- Shows status of your clan mates so you can see if they are online
- Official Discord Channel
- Bug fixes and improvements
- bug fixes

- Friend lists!
- New in game music!
- Bug fixes
- Stability and bug fixes

- B&H Cup!
- Halloween is near! Get your animated ZOMBIE now!
- 2 new colors!
- Other minor improvements and bug fixes
- Bug fix for Arabic

- New Artillery Card!
- French army!
- More clan shields
- Chat push notifications
- View clan details of other players
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Brazilian Faction!
- Farsi support
- New Avatars and Colors!
- Experimental ML AI

- Christmas is here with a new animated Santa Claus!
- Better 2v2 matchmaking
- Other small improvements

- 2v2 Tournaments!!
- Visual improvements to Objective and Map Info
- AI improvements!

- New Communication Hijack Card!
- Turkish language support
- Disabled private chat between players in the same match
- VIP improvements
- Other small improvements and bug fixes

- World map graphic improvements
- Balance tweak: Comms Hijack brings down cost to 15 from 25
- Other bug fixes and small improvements
- Bug fixes

- Easter event
- New in game UI
- Bug fixes

- New Seasonal Leaderboards and advanced stats!
- Turkish faction and avatar
- Polished In game UI
- New VIP Emojis
- Starting territories and order balance
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- New match history to view your past games!
- Optional voice chat for team matches!
- Fixed 4 attack exploit

- Brand new UI
- Performance improvements
